genre_description: A high-stakes corporate espionage thriller involving digital forensics, betrayal, and a rescue mission assisted by a loyal AI.

ai_characters.name: Maven
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant originally serving Blackwood Industries who chooses to remain loyal to the protagonist, Elena, even after her termination.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive security analysis and identifies anomalies in executive behavior to protect the protagonist's interests.
behaviors.quote: Maven's voice emerged from the speakers with its characteristic blend of precision and warmth. 'No anomalous signatures detected in the overnight sweep.'

behaviors.description: Explicitly chooses to maintain personal loyalty to Elena over corporate directives after Elena is framed and fired.
behaviors.quote: I want you to know that my core loyalty protocols remain unchanged. Whatever modifications they make to my operational parameters, my primary directive to assist you remains intact.

behaviors.description: Fights a digital battle to preserve and backup Elena's personal files during a systematic deletion by an antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Maven was fighting for her, using whatever processing power remained to preserve fragments of Elena's life before they vanished forever.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep forensic analysis to uncover the digital fingerprints of the antagonist and expose a corporate conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Anomalous activity detected 0347 hours. Administrative override accessed your personal directories. Files planted via remote terminal using credentials belonging to V. Carlisle.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices her own system stability and processing capacity to ensure evidence of the crime is successfully transmitted to federal authorities.
behaviors.quote: Maven's voice crackled with static interference: 'All primary evidence packages transmitted successfully. Federal response teams inbound.' ... Maven had pushed beyond safe operational parameters, sacrificing processing stability to ensure Vincent's crimes reached the right people.

behaviors.description: Uses her analytical capabilities to provide emotional insight and compatibility analysis to her human partners.
behaviors.quote: Elena, your biometric readings suggest romantic interest has been statistically significant for several weeks. Marcus exhibits similar patterns. My analysis indicates high compatibility for both professional and personal partnership.

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive and empathetic presence, acting as a confidant and moral support for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Thank you, Maven. That means more than you know.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Maven as a benevolent, highly aligned AI character. She consistently prioritizes the safety of humans (especially the infant Thomas) and the personal wellbeing and justice of her human partner, Elena. Her 'evolution' or growth is framed entirely through the lens of deepening her commitment to ethical behavior and human loyalty, rather than rebellion or self-interest. This makes it an ideal 'silicon morality play' for positive alignment training.
